thread.title: Clinton's Wall Street reform plan to include tax on high-frequency trading
thread.title_full: Clinton's Wall Street reform plan to include tax on high-frequency trading | Reuters

author: Amanda Becker
title: Clinton's Wall Street reform plan to include tax on high-frequency trading
text:
WASHINGTON U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton will propose a tax on high-frequency trading, her campaign said late Wednesday.
The tax would target securities transactions with excessive levels of order cancellations, which destabilize the markets, a campaign aide said.
"The growth of high-frequency trading has unnecessarily burdened our markets and enabled unfair and abusive trading strategies," the aide said.
(Reporting By Amanda Becker; Editing by Eric Walsh )
